Human Activity Prediction:

Developed a deep learning model using Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks to predict human activities based on real-time sensor data. Achieved an accuracy of 92% on benchmark datasets.

Designed a machine learning pipeline using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) for early detection of brain tumors. Deployed the solution using Flask for a user-friendly interface, achieving a 94% accuracy rate.

Built a comprehensive attendance and event management system tailored for student clubs. Enabled automated attendance tracking, event scheduling, and report generation, enhancing administrative efficiency.

Created a prototype sensor system for self-driving cars using Arduino and ultrasonic sensors. The system was capable of detecting objects within a 2-meter range and triggering alerts in real time.

Designed a robust database management system for hostel operations. Implemented functionalities for room allocation, student tracking, and fee management using SQL and PHP.
